title: County Kildare News | Latest Ireland News
body_text:
About our County Kildare news
Latest news on Kildare, an Irish county located in the eastern and midland region of the Republic of Ireland, within the province of Leinster. Kildare is the 24th-largest of Ireland's 32 counties in area and the seventh-largest in terms of population, with the local authority being the Kildare County Council.
